IDUN Dryode

Overview#

We are very excited to work with IDUN Technologies to offer this affordable, high-quality biosensing kit to our community!

The Dryodeâ„¢ offers waterproof, research-grade signal quality with the ease of a consumer product. This state-of-the-art flexible dry electrode is designed for biopotential data acquisition (ECG, EMG, and EEG). It is connectable to the OpenBCI Cyton, CytonDaisy, or Ganglion board using OpenBCI snap electrode cables, as well as compatible with most standard snap electrode cables.

Head over to the EMG Getting Started Guide to learn how to connect the EMG set-up!
